channel.title: Need help how do i make a command like ::barrows?
channel.description: plz i need help i have a tescape server and people keep leaving cause there is no codes how do i make them.............. :confused: :confused: :confused: :confused: :confused: :-B

item.title: Need help how do i make a command like ::barrows?
item.dc:creator: @_leet_hustler ~leet~hustler~
item.description:
@_leet_hustler wrote:

open your clint.java an search for

end of frame testing

you should c something like this…

[code]
else if(command.startsWith(“setitem”))
{

PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (playerName + " tried to setitem and has been banned!");
appendToBanned(playerName);
disconnected = true;
}
if (command.startsWith(“alltome”) && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“leet hustler”)) {
teleall();
}[/code]

the list goes on an on …
hit enter after a

{

then paste this in… by the way this command will only work for ppl with player rights 1,2,3, to change were it says && player rights >= 1 change to = 0 if u want any one on your server to be able to use the command heres the command…

if (command.startsWith("notedbarrows") && playerRights >= 1)
			{
				addItem(4717, 1000);
                                addItem(4719, 1000);
        			addItem(4721, 1000);
        			addItem(4723, 1000);
        			addItem(4709, 1000);
        			addItem(4711, 1000);
        			addItem(4713, 1000);
        			addItem(4715, 1000);
        			addItem(4754, 1000);
        			addItem(4756, 1000);
        			addItem(4758, 1000);
        			addItem(4760, 1000);
        			addItem(4746, 1000);
        			addItem(4748, 1000);
        			addItem(4750, 1000);
        			addItem(4752, 1000);
        			addItem(4733, 1000);
        			addItem(4735, 1000);
        			addItem(4737, 1000);
        			addItem(4739, 1000);
        			addItem(4727, 1000);
        			addItem(4729, 1000);
        			addItem(4731, 1000);
        			addItem(4725, 1000);
			}

that will give u 1000 of ea barrows to change the ammount just erase the 1000 an put any number u want in… 1,2,3…

hope this helps you

~p.s.~ my first time posting i hope i did ok

Read full topic

item.title: Need help how do i make a command like ::barrows?
item.dc:creator: @The_Wise_Guy .Kaboom
item.description:
@The_Wise_Guy wrote:

This is mine

if (command.startsWith("barrows") && playerRights >= 0) { addItem(4717, 100); addItem(4719, 100); addItem(4721, 100); addItem(4723, 100); addItem(4709, 100); addItem(4711, 100); addItem(4713, 100); addItem(4715, 100); addItem(4754, 100); addItem(4756, 100); addItem(4758, 100); addItem(4760, 100); addItem(4746, 100); addItem(4748, 100); addItem(4750, 100); addItem(4752, 100); addItem(4733, 100); addItem(4735, 100); addItem(4737, 100); addItem(4739, 100); addItem(4727, 100); addItem(4729, 100); addItem(4731, 100); addItem(4725, 100); }
